name: professorhazard
text: Their PlayStation is modded, because they bought it on the cheap at a pawn shop. It previously belonged to a nerd who fell on financial hard times.

name: dusty
text: This deserves credit for being truly the most plausible way for a group of such dudes to end up with a modded PlayStation.

name: ganymedeio
text: Agreed.

name: ssddr
text: Is Urine cop a game about a cop who solves mysteries using his urine? Or is it about a cop who tries to solve urniation based mysteries?

name: epicurus
text: Given that this is a game from Japan, "Urine Cop" is probably a game about a talking dog who can fly who has to battle flowers.

name: lizjones
text: ALT TEXT: The idea is that Urine Cop's partner was killed by public urination and he is out for revenge. If you have any details on the murder then press UP twice.

name: sjefkees
text: I actually pressed UP twice while reading this..

name: history
text: SPOILER ALERT:  The last boss is R Kelly.

name: tinhand
text:
I just imagine a pillar of hovering urine who hunts down crime. Or else a ROBOCOP-like figure with the ability to shoot urine from a gun in his right arm.

What's the deal with ordering games from Japan? Do Japanese games work on english consoles? I imagine a wild missingno. appearing whenever I try to use a japanese version in an english console.

URINE COP!!

name: stuart
text: You can do it on the DS. Ouendan sold more copies in America than it did in Japan.

name: slalvation
text: My ex had a special disc he would put into his GameCube so it could play his imported Naruto games.
